history.proof: intros net. unfold pt_map_onet, deserialize_onet. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
orig_multi_params: MultiParams orig_base_params
orig_failure_params: FailureParams orig_multi_params
orig_name_overlay_params: NameOverlayParams orig_multi_params
orig_fail_msg_params: FailMsgParams orig_multi_params
orig_new_msg_params: NewMsgParams orig_multi_params
orig_msg_serializer: Serializer msg

Goal:
forall net : ordered_network, pt_map_onet net = deserialize_onet net

Premises:
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
pt_map_onet = fun (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd) (base_map : BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd) (name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd) (msg_map : MultiParamsMsgPartialMap multi_fst multi_snd) (onet : ordered_network) => {| onwPackets := fun src dst : name => filterMap pt_map_msg (onwPackets onet (tot_map_name_inv src) (tot_map_name_inv dst)); onwState := fun n : name => pt_map_data (onwState onet (tot_map_name_inv n)) |} : forall (base_fst base_snd : BaseParams) (multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst) (multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd), BaseParamsPartialMap base_fst base_snd
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in msg : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments msg {P MultiParams}
Record ordered_network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkONetwork { onwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; onwState : name -> data } Arguments ordered_network {P params} Arguments mkONetwork {P params} (_ _)%function_scope
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record NewMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NewMsgParams { msg_new : msg } Arguments NewMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_NewMsgParams [P0]
Record Serializer (A : Type) : Type := Build_Serializer { serialize : A -> IOStreamWriter.t; deserialize : ByteListReader.t A; serialize_deserialize_id : serialize_deserialize_id_spec serialize deserialize } Arguments Serializer _%type_scope Arguments Build_Serializer [A]%type_scope _%function_scope [deserialize] _%function_scope
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]

adjacent_to = fun (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) (NameOverlayParams0 : NameOverlayParams P) => let (adjacent_to, _, _, _) := NameOverlayParams0 in adjacent_to : forall (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0), NameOverlayParams P -> Relation_Definitions.relation name Arguments adjacent_to {P0 P NameOverlayParams}
serialize_onet = fun net : ordered_network => {| onwPackets := fun src dst : name => map (fun v : msg => serialize_top (serialize v)) (onwPackets net src dst); onwState := onwState net |} : ordered_network -> ordered_network
Inductive step_ordered (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : step_relation ordered_network (name * (input + output)) := StepOrdered_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) ->...-> step_ordered net net' tr Arguments step_ordered {P params} Arguments StepOrdered_deliver {P params} _ [net'] [tr]%list_scope [m] [ms out]%list_scope [d] [l]%list_scope _ [to] Arguments StepOrdered_input {P params} [h] _ [net'] [tr out]%list_scope [inp d] [l]%list_scope
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr

unfold pt_map_onet, deserialize_onet.
extensionality src dst.

unfold filterMap.
destruct (deserialize_top orig_msg_serializer (pt_map_msg (onwPackets net (tot_map_name_inv src) (tot_map_name_inv dst)))).
- simpl. reflexivity.
